transcript:
Customer: Hello
Han ji boliye. Hello ji Rohit ji Vijay Agrawal bol raha hun India Mart se 10 minute me aap keh rahe the call karne ke liye sir. Nahi nahi waise aap se kal mera baat
Han ji
Waha pe network nahi rehta sir isliye aadha aadha baat kyu karna karke abhi bahar hi aaya boliye.
Bas mai ye kehne ke liye call kiya tha ki aapka already account manager Abhishek hai sir theek hai jisse aapki already baat chal rahi thi.
Yes
To kal maine aapko call kiya tha shayad aap kal busy the to proper tarike se baat ho nahi payi thi sir apni to bas mai ye puch raha tha ki jo aapne not satisfied ka aapne feedback diya tha theek hai to wo matlab kuch issue tha India Mart se ki aapne isko not satisfied mark kiya tha sir. Yes yes
Sir matlab mai satisfied hi bol ke lagaya tha but wo by mistake upar click karne ka niche satisfied hi lagaya tha. Upar ki jagah pe niche click ho gaya aapka. Okay
By by mistake click ho gaya wo no acha hi suggestion de rahe but problem kya ho raha bola to leads aane me problem hai Hyderabad me
Jo leads aa rahe hai na usme problem ho raha hai kya hai bole to like mera sheeting ka work hai like boundary walls ka but bar bar kya ho ja raha bolte usme hint wall panels like pre fabricated walls ka aa raha hai wo.
Uske related mai unse baat kiya tha.
Wall panel ka aa raha hai aapke pass.
Yes yes wall panels ka aa raha. Unhone setting karke bhi diya sab kuch sab theek karke diya but fir bhi aane ka wo mere ko baad me suggestion diye ki wo ignore karne ke liye bole the jo jo aapko aapke category me nahi aata. Not interested mark karne ke liye bole unhone.
Not interested mark karne ke liye bolenge aapko. Not interested mark karne ke liye bole the wahi. Haan
Bilkul jo bhi aapko kaam ki nahi hai na. Yes usko aap not relevant mark kar dijiye wo deboost ho jayegi. Kyunki aapne na waise yaha pe selected rakhe hue hai stainless steel railing ho gaya my steel railing ho gaya aapka. Pura sab kuch selected rakha but fir bhi mere ko leads but dusre dusre category ke aa rahe hai bahut sare.
Stainless steel aapki jo location preference hai sir aapki wo aapki Hyderabad hi hai sir aapki. Yes Hyderabad hai.
Hyderabad Shamshabad airport ka near hai.
Achha matlab apni state me aap deal karte ho aap ye kehna chah rahe ho aap sir. Yes yes yes yes. Kyunki hamara work hi aisa hai sir like fabrication related work hai to hum apne state me hi thoda humko profit rehta hai kyunki yaha pe hi jyada work hai other states me lena dena jyada nahi rehta kyunki jaha waha ka work alag hai pattern yaha ka work pattern alag rehta. Isliye jyadatar hum log yahi pe prefer karte hai.
Ye aap isme deal karte hai steel metal boundary wall me. Yes steel metal boundary wall me. Hai na Hyderabad se 11 ghante pehle deal aayi thi aapki lead aapke pass aayi thi. Uske baad steel railing se aayi thi.
Yes sir maine open kiya maine open matlab isse pehle bhi open kiya to nahi nahi zarurat nahi hai karke do teen bar like false wale aaye the wo. Aur ek kya ho ja raha bolta flash message jaisa aa raha hai mai open kar raha hun bas gayab ho ja raha hai wo.
Achha wo sir isliye ho jata hai kyunki agar aap is by lead ko immediate basis pe consume nahi karenge aur agar aap se pehle panch supplier ne consume kar li to wo sold out ho jayegi lead aapki sir. Okay okay wahi ekdam waisa hi ho raha hai. To aapko us pe more active rehna padega by lead ko consumption karne ke liye sir aapko. Yes yes yes samajh gaye samajh gaye.
Aur jaise abhi aapke pass char ghante pehle aapke pass stainless steel railing ki requirement aapke pass aayi thi. Steel ye sab wo structure ki requirement aapke pass aayi thi. Okay
Okay ki aapke pass 19 ghante pehle requirement aapke pass aayi thi. Work kya hai bole to mai jab open karta hun mujhe ek bhi deal nahi dikhai deta hai jab mai offline me rehta hun jabhi dikhta hai pura. Hmmm
Nahi sir thoda sa na aapke pass notification aayega beech beech me na India Mart ka jo app hai na aap beech beech me open karte raha kijiyega sir. Taki jo leads aapke pass aa rahi hai wo matlab ki sold out na ho sir aapki. Okay theek hai.
Aur cliento ke sath apna review rating lete raha kijiyega sir theek hai jo bhi aap review rating lenge usse aapke improvement aapka hoga sir iske andar aapke catalog ka. Nahi nahi sir mai le raha hun le raha hun mai actually le leta hun jyadatar. Aur baki jo kuch le leta hun jyadatar. Haan aur jo aapne khud by lead consume kari thi wo relevant wo usse baat chal rahi hai jo aapne by lead consume kari hai sir. No no sir wo pure koi abhi aapne ki galti aapne Hyderabad se. Yes yes
Sir thoda sa na more active raho 12 tarikh ke baad aapne koi lead consume bhi nahi kari sir to aapki ranking ban nahi payegi sir aapki. Aapki A rank category ban nahi payengi jiski wajah se aapke pass inquiry ka flow lead ka flow aapka kam rahega sir aapka. Aap jitni jyada by lead consume karoge utna fayda sir aapko iske andar milega sir. Okay
Theek hai theek hai theek hai sir. Thoda sa is cheez pe bilkul dhyan dijiye sir baki catalog quality score agar aapko chahiye baki koi dikkat aapki hai nahi theek hai. Theek hai theek hai thank you theek hai to aapne not satisfied kiya na concern resolve ho gaya to mai close kar deta hun aapka theek hai. Okay sir
Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Marked feedback as not satisfied by mistake.

- Leads are not relevant to the business.

- Flash message appears and disappears quickly.

- Not receiving deals when online.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to mark irrelevant leads.

- Executive suggested being more active on the app.

- Executive suggested taking review ratings from clients.

- Executive suggested to consume more buyleads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, not satisfied, app, ranking
